comment.author: 90134546@N00
comment._content: What an amazing  structure. A combination of the old & the new. In the UK they would have demolished the old to build the new. Maybe they did here too. Is it still in use? That car on the crossing looks old.

comment.author: 89394157@N02
comment._content: Great shot!! An Austin saloon going over the crossing. What goes on in a signal box? ...not a lot? Find out here:- www.flickr.com/photos/89394157@N02/8230461592 /in/photostr...
